attributes.additional_details: I petition the Scottish Government to abolish the ridiculous Home Pack which is a legal requirement in order to sell your home.  These are extremely expensive and at times inaccurate. In many instances Mortgage Companies still request a further Survey.

rejection.details:
This request should be submitted to the Scottish Parliament Public Petition website. See address below.

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/vli/publicinfo/htsapp/Index.htm
